nodes.text: A duel occurred on Valahari after Obi-Wan Kenobi discovered that Asajj Ventress was responsible for the sabotage of Viscount Harko Vane. This sabotage lead to his death. Obi-Wan Kenobi tried to inform the viscount's widow, Elodore Vane, of the event. En route, he was confronted by Ventress. After a brief duel Kenobi made his escape.
